messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Christian viewpoints (was Young earth	vs. old earth)
messages.msgSnippet: I can t get my kids to clean up their rooms, I don t think I d have much success in getting the world to follow along with my opinion ;-) Honestly? Again it
messages.messageBody:
I can't get my kids to clean up their rooms, I don't think I'd have much success in getting the world to follow along with my opinion ;-)

Honestly? Again it depends on what you mean. I would vote, protest etc. against something which I felt morally reprehensible. However, I don't need anyone else in the world to see it my way. (Psst, just between you and me, most of the world sees it differently than I do. Even most Orthodox Jewish, homeschooling feminists!)

Anyway, I am feeling rather numb I guess. I just came back from the funeral of a 27 man. Who did a lot of living in his short time on earth.... It was very upsetting....

be well,
Rachel Ann


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
